scikit-fem
==========

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

This package contains finite element assemblers. They transform bilinear and
linear forms into sparse matrices and vectors.

Mesh module
-----------

.. automodule:: skfem.mesh

Assembly module
---------------

.. automodule:: skfem.assembly

Element module
--------------

.. automodule:: skfem.element

Indices and tables
==================

* :ref:`genindex`
* :ref:`modindex`
* :ref:`search`
